data.title: Compass Group USA
data.meta_description: As the leading foodservice and support services company, Compass Group North America is a family of companies building experiences for all of our customers.
data.text:
We’re Compass Group

But you might know us by a different name.

If you’ve dined in college quads or hospital dining rooms, ballparks or museums, school cafeterias or corporate cafés, airport lounges or senior living communities, chances are you’ve dined with us. We’re the nation’s largest family of foodservice and facilities services companies, serving more than 11 million meals and maintaining more than 1.9 billion square feet a day – and every single one of them counts.

Find the Compass Company that Fits You

Careers

We’re always looking for the next big idea – and we believe it could come from you.

We pride ourselves on hiring and empowering the most capable minds from every background and walk of life. People are the heart of our business, and this drives us to continue building a culture of inclusion, across all 50 states and in every stage of your career.

Hourly Opportunities Salaried Opportunities Compass Corporate Opportunities.

Envision

Creating Impact that Matters

From strategic space design to eliminating food waste, our think tank team Envision is focused on creating solutions and building partnerships that drive commercial success while promoting the well-being of people and the planet. Together with innovators across Compass Group, Envision is driving growth and innovation while leading with a purposeful ambition to improve lives and the environment.
